questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
Taking place on a ship graveyard, this arc introduces the character of Brook and the concept of the Florian Triangle. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against the undead on a ghost island under the control of Gecko Moria. What is...?
This power allows its user to manipulate darkness and gravity, famously held by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This devil fruit allows its user to create tremors capable of causing massive destruction, and was notably used by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This power, belonging to a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows the user to sprout limbs and duplicate body parts. What is...?
This character, known for their nickname 'Dead Bones', is a former Warlord of the Sea and master of swordsmanship. Who is...?
This character, a former Warlord of the Sea, is known for their former bounty of 340 million berries and their power of the Mera Mera no Mi. Who is...?
This character, the leader of the On Air Pirates, is known for their Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, enabling them to transform into a model of the mythical creature Yamata no Orochi. Who is...?
